DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Collecting store sample tissue patient non-Hodgkin lymphoma study laboratory may help study cancer future . PURPOSE : This laboratory study collect store tissue sample patient relapse recurrent non-Hodgkin lymphoma treatment Southwest Oncology Group ( SWOG ) clinical trial .
DOC.brief_title: SWOG-9245 Collecting Storing Tissue Samples From Patients With Relapsed Recurrent Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma After Treatment Southwest Oncology Group Clinical Trial
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Acquire fresh snap-frozen lymphoma tissue patient relapse recurrent non-Hodgkin lymphoma treatment Southwest Oncology Group ( SWOG ) clinical trial . - Establish standard set procedure routine acquisition , banking , study lymphoma tissue within SWOG . - Use repository tissue establish clinical correlation via presently activate phenotyping study future project molecular study assess specimen DNA RNA status . - Examine biology therapy failure relationship change pretreatment post-treatment immunophenotypic data . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Tissues collect biopsy snap-frozen archived future molecular genetic study . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Not specify
